entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
